website_summaries.verdict: This police station is ready for a jail break! Add it to a collection or let it stand alone; it's fun for all ages.
pros: Guard tower, jail cells, security gate – LEGO thought of everything with this set
With six mini figures, a dog, and a cat, there are plenty of scenarios to play out for a good game of cops and robbers
cons: We couldn't find a single one

customer_reviews.title: Back the Blue.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get this set when Lego bent the knee to the marxist BLM. Get this if you support our boys in blue or just for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Rice 3rd

customer_reviews.title: A police-loving kid’s dream!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old is obsessed with legos and police. This was a dream-come-true gift for him. It took a long time to build (seeing as how he is 5) but it has been worth it. He has spent hours playing with this and incorporating the other police legos he has. Well worth the investment for our family!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: And amazing set, hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great details, lots of fun. My boys love playing with this set. So many great things to this set. Wouldn't recommend for younger kids, the amount of steps and details are pretty extensive. However if you're like me and you like building the sets for your youngins, then this one is still a lot of fun for younger kids to play with once it's assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kara P.

customer_reviews.title: Neat!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Legos just like his daddy. This set is neat! I thought he would need help with it but he built it all by himself in less than two days. I was impressed! The one downside? It wasn't cheap! For the money, I expected something a bit larger but he loves playing with it and he's really proud of himself for building it. I'll certainly be purchasing more sets in this series!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron S

customer_reviews.title: This set is just awesome. I know legos are pricey
customer_reviews.text: This set is just awesome. I know legos are pricey, but you get such a quality product. When my 7 year old put this together, he had a riot. The jail that you see in the picture is pretty cool - there is a button that gets pushed and the wall blows out. Pretty cool. If you are looking for a large set to give as a gift, I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bruinooge

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Pieces
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He is 6. It takes 2 days to put this together. Lots of small pieces and very tedious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic legos
customer_reviews.text: One of the most famous lego sets in existence. Get them before they're gone forever. Back the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Great city
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old brother who loves legos. Age appropriate and fun to build :)
customer_reviews.author: Brock & Jess

customer_reviews.title: Lego City Police Station
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old son who put it together himself within hours. He displays it on his dresser and it looks pretty cool. Received product in perfect condition and got it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Poet Lover 101

customer_reviews.title: Perfect birthday gift, infinite fun!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for your child at any age. My son loves LEGO and this addition to the collection was the greatest so far. It took me an hour to put it together and it was so much fun to build it! My five year old plays with it everyday since I got it for him. Unlimited fun, easy to build guide and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: LEGO City Police Station 60141
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for our 5 year old great grandson. His mom says he loves, loves, loves it! You can't go wrong with Legos!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego Set.
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to do an HO Scale Model Train town but my Dad and I could never figure out how to start one so instead I decided to do a Lego town and now my Lego town work in progress the mini figs can call the Police to report a crime and also my Dad is a retired Baltimore County Policeman.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny124

customer_reviews.title: My son will love this
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a deal of $53.99 which was exciting! My son is going to love this for Christmas. He had the fire station and loves it this will add to the collection!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: My son spent many hours playing with this
customer_reviews.text: We ended up spending a little more than we wanted for this LEGO set, but my son got a ton of use out of it. I have had to put it together two or three times for him and he's starting to get interested in how to follow the instructions to build it himself. In particular, he loves the police car. Even if we break apart the base occasionally, he never takes apart the car itself.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: super duper useful!!!
customer_reviews.text: we use this for our other sets, like the police truck, just....REALLY useful! we even use this for sets that are not lego, like playmobil!! AND add A police boat when it is in the water!! amazing use, and ABSOLUTELEY reccomend buying this!!

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my kid for Xmas and it was received with excitement. Though the price is a bit steep given the paly time on it so far I feel it is worth it. Construction time of a couple of hours will keep the adults entertained also.

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This police station went together so well! It was a little difficult at times for our 5 year old, but he could do a lot of it on his own. He loves the police station and the vehicles! We would definitely buy it for him again!

customer_reviews.title: Cool LEGO set!

customer_reviews.title: Shipping damage
customer_reviews.text: This gift will be used for a Christmas gift. Although the product is fine, I was disappointed it was not packaged in a separate box to keep the lego box from being damaged as it was. The contents are fine, but giving a ripped and torn lego box to a child is dissatisfying.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Grandson with Autism Spectrum Disorder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for a 12 year old grandson who has autism spectrum disorder, and he absolutely LOVED it! He was able to direct his energy for hours until he had it assembled, and he really enjoys it. Will be picking up other Lego sets for him as they go on sale. Would definitely recommend for any child interested in building.

product_meta.title: LEGO City Police Station 60141 Building Kit with Cop Car, Jail Cell, and Helicopter, Top Toy and Play Set for Boys and Girls (894 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Inspire kids to create their own drama with the LEGO City Police as they try to keep the criminal crooks locked away in prison. Featuring a 3-level police station loaded with accessories like a jail set with exploding wall function, watchtower, garage and offices, helicopter, cop car, police motorbike, plus the crooks’ truck with rotating cherry picker. Includes 7 minifigures, plus a police dog.
feature_bullets: The most popular cops and robbers play set is here! Top toy for kids. Includes a 3-level police station, minifigures, cop car, jail cell, helicopter, watch tower, toy motorcycles and more! Suitable for boys and girls age 6-12.

Includes 894 LEGO pieces for kids to build the best toy jailbreak story they can imagine. Includes 4 police officer minifigures, 3 crooks, a police cruiser, plus a police dog. Kids will feel part of the action with the variety of cool vehicles and endless roleplaying opportunities.
Vehicles included are a helicopter, police pursuit car, police motorbike plus the crooks’ truck with rotating, extendable cherry picker for unlimited good guys vs. bad guys role playing.
LEGO City building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building.

Police Station measures over 9” high, 14” wide and 14” deep, Helicopter over 3” high, 7” long and 1” wide, Police Car over 1” high, 4” long and 1” wide, Motorbike over 1” high, 2” long and under 1” wide, Truck over 2” high, 4” long and 1” wide.
